participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Ethan is imaginative and resilient, often using his creativity to cope with challenges.
participant_1.background: i had to have a transplant. i'm a boy. i was born with my heart outside my body. i can move objects with my mind.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Lily is nurturing and artistic, always looking for ways to express her love through baking and crafts.
participant_2.background: i love to bake cookies. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i'm scared of dying. i've a dogs.
